sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_c245788bdb221300f72fe04a489619d5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Values From Current User</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-203 10-Jun-2018  James Jose      Initial implementation
 *
 **/
function onLoad() {
   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var userName = g_user.userName;
	
	
	//debugger;
	console.log('User Fullname: ' + g_user.getFullName());
	
	// ToDo. Why gr.get() does not work?
	//var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	//grUser.get(userID);
    //var title = gr.title;
	//console.log('--- Logged In User Title: ' + title);
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	gr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);
	gr.setLimit(1);
	gr.query(recUser);
	
	function recUser(rec){
		
		console.log(rec);
		
		//Must be one record
		while (rec.next()) {
			
			// Is this the correct way?
			var rsCB = rec.recordSet[0];
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', rsCB.company.displayvalue);
		    
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 16:45:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c245788bdb221300f72fe04a489619d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Values From Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c245788bdb221300f72fe04a489619d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-11 16:45:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
